text: Hi, do you usually donate to charities
I DO
great! You're such a nice person. What charities do you usually donate to?
To church, I return tithes and I also do the offerings
great! Well, have you ever heard about Save the Children charity?
no, can you tell me more about it?
it's an international non-governemntal organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries
nice! I have a child so i'm all about helping kids
would you donate to this charity? your donation will make such a huge impact for some children
I would like to know more before i donate. How do i know if it's a legit organization
it is a trustable fund! It's one of the top rated charities in the world!
interesting. So if i donate will 100% of my donation go to a child?
86% goes to help children, 9% goes to fundraising and 5% goes to management and other things.
i just don't know why i've never heard about it
neither do i! It's such a well known charity! It just so sad to see children from developing countries die from easily preventable deseases
it is sad, i agree with you

million of Syrian children have grown up facing the daily threat of violence. You said you have a kid. Imagine your precious child going through it every day. waking up every day being afraid of getting killed
that breaks my heart. I would do anything to protect my son
And you can also protect those children if you donate to our fund! YOU can make a difference
okay, I might donate
Great! How much would you like to donate? You're awesome
